free: #e The cock made cockcrow in the morning.
#c 雞在早上啼叫。
#n 這裡的鳥應是指雞。
#e An old male farmer went to work early in the morning.
#c 一位老農夫一早去工作。
#n IU2 中的tamdaw 為阿美語; 撒奇萊雅語則為 tademaw「人」。
#e The fruits were ripe.
#c 果實成熟了。
#e He climbed the fruit tree to pluck the fruits.
#c 他爬上果樹摘果實。
#n kalic 為北勢阿美語; kacaw為撒奇萊雅語。
#e His trees bore many fruits.
#c 他的樹結很多果實。
#e There was a basket of fruits.
#c 已裝滿一個菜籃。
#n cayna 為閩南語，漢字譯成「菜籃」。
#e He plucked the fruits in a hurry.
#c 他又趕緊摘果實。
#e Farmers went to work in a hurry.
#c 去田裡的人趕緊到田裡去。
#n 重疊型態 tam-tamdaw (人人) 為阿美語; ta-tademaw, tad-tadmaw 為撒奇萊雅語。
#e Other people fed goats.
#c 其他的就餵羊去了。
#n MEI 為羊叫聲 (bleat; 咩咩)
#e The person who fed goats pulled goats.
#c 餵羊的人牽著羊。
#e The cycler rode his bicycle to the place he wanted to go.
#c 騎腳踏車的人就騎車到他要去的地方。
#e A child rode his bicycle in a hurry, who passed by the farmer and arrived at where he plucked his fruits.
#c 有一個小孩專心騎車穿過，然後到達農夫摘果實的地方。
#n ma-tukuh 原形應為maka-tukuh (到達)。
#e That child said that “Wow! That basket is full.”
#c 小孩說：「哇!這菜籃已裝滿了。」
#e He helped him carry one basket of fruits.
#c 他幫忙他拿了一個菜籃的果實。
#n IU 28中padang 是阿美語; 撒奇萊雅語則為 edap。
#e He put it onto a bicycle.
#c 他把菜籃放到腳踏車上。
#e He rode a bicycle in a hurry.
#c 他趕緊騎車。
#e A girl rode a bicycle in front of him.
#c 有一個女的騎腳踏車在他前面。
#e That boy said, “Ah! it is Bedi’.”
#c 那男孩說：「啊！是Bedi。」
#e Bedi’, it’s good." (Somebody said.)
#c 「Bedi’，好好喔！」（有人這麼說。）
#e That child looked back when the girl passed by.
#c 那小孩一直回頭當女孩經過時。
#n kayin 為阿美語; kayuin為撒奇萊雅語。
#e He looked back and did not see the stone in front of him.
#c 他回頭看而沒看到前面的石頭。
#n cay=tu 為 ca’ay=tu 的縮寫。
#e That child hit a stone and tripped.
#c 那小孩撞到石頭，然後跌倒。
#n ma-skung原為「揍」，所以應為mata-bihkud「撞到」。
#e The fruits, which were put in the front of the bicycle, poured out and scattered on the road.
#c 那老人裝滿的果實從腳踏車上倒出來倒在路上。
#n ma-belun是水倒出來。
#e The three children said, “That child tripped!”
#c 那三個小孩說：「那小孩跌倒了。」
#n 在阿美語中通稱男孩為Tuy。
#e The three children saw it on the road and helped him.
#c 三個小孩在路上看到那就去幫忙。
#e The three children helped Tuy fill the basket with fruits.
#c 那三個小孩就去幫忙Tuy 把菜籃裝滿果實。
#e The child said thank you to those who helped him pick up the fruits.
#c 那小孩跟幫忙他撿果實的說謝謝。
#e He left.
#c 他就走了。
#e Three children said, “he is not on purpose.”
#c 三個小孩說：「他是不小心的。」
#n haymaw表示「慢慢地」；pi-haymaw-i表示「請小心」；haymaw-en 表示「再見」。
#e The child who took fruits left.
#c 那個拿果實的小孩走了。
#e (we saw) he left his hat here.
#c （我們看到）他把帽子忘在這裡。
#e He told him that your hat was here.
#c 他跟他說你的帽子在這裡。
#e He gave him his hat.
#c 他把帽子給他。
#e The hat dropped when the boy tripped.
#c 帽子是因為跌倒掉下來的。
#e He have (him) the hat.
#c 就把帽子給（他）。
#e Thank you for giving me.
#c 謝謝你給我的。
#e Tuy said that I do not know what to do without you.
#c Tuy說如果沒有你的話，我不知道怎如何是好。
#e Tuy gave each person one fruit.
#c Tuy分給每人一個果實。
#e He left.
#c 離開了。
#e It is Tuy who gave them.
#c 是Tuy給他們的。
#n ma-kilac 為阿美語; ma-wada’才是撒奇萊雅語。
#e They ate it.
#c 他們就吃了。
#e They went to where they could play.
#c 他們走到他們玩的地方。
#n salama 為中部及南勢阿美語.
#e They passed by where the farmer was.
#c 他們經過那裡果農的地方。
#e The farmer who finished his plucking descended.
#c 摘完了果實的果農下來了。
#e He saw and one basket disappeared.
#c 他看一籃怎麼不見了。
#e Where was it?
#c 到哪去了。
